subject: Dogfighting
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: PETA, a daily presence in court during the Michael Vick case, generally advocates euthanizing rescued fighting dogs, while other groups lean toward rehabilitation.
snippet: PETA, a daily presence in court during the Michael Vick case, generally advocates euthanizing rescued fighting dogs, while other groups lean toward rehabilitation.
